content: this is a very simple and practical am i always practical perhaps crochet pattern to keep those darn bugs out of my coffee i thought perhaps you would like to keep them out of your coffee too so here is a fast fix - took maybe 20 minutes - and now i can drink my coffee or cold beverages outside on my deck without the icky bugs popping by for a bath or taste test if you leave a small hole in the center instead of tightening the beginning stitches completely you can also easily fit a straw through and leave the cover on your drink and use the straw the beads provide weight to keep the cover from blowing off the glass or mug you can use whichever beads or weights you have on hand - metal washers will even work if you are in a bind this also has the added bonus of keeping my coffee hot longer - not my intention but it works great enjoy please favorite and queue the design if you make it i would love to see your finished photos and if you want to be featured in one of my weekly newsletters message me i will add an approved photo and link to you or your site/shop rhondda
